messages.content: Kaise ho?
Main theek hoon, aur tum?
Good morning, kya haal hai?
Good morning! Sab badhiya, tumhara kya scene hai?
Kal ka exam tough tha na?
Haan yaar, bohot hi tough tha. Fingers crossed!
Aaj lunch mein kya khaya?
Aaj biryani aur raita khaya, mast tha!
Mujhe ek chai pilao.
Bilkul! Ek kadak chai turant aa rahi hai.
Weekend ka kya plan hai?
Soch raha hoon Netflix binge karein, tumhara kya plan hai?
Shopping jaane ka mann hai, chalein?
Haan chalo, mujhe bhi kuch kapde lene hain.
Tumhara favorite movie kaun si hai?
3 Idiots! Full paisa vasool aur emotional bhi.
Meeting ka time badal gaya kya?
Haan, ab meeting 4 baje hogi.
Dinner ready hai?
Haan, garam garam khana table pe hai.
Homework mein help karoge?
Of course, kis subject mein help chahiye?
Thoda stress ho raha hai exams ko lekar.
Don't worry yaar, tumne achhi preparation ki hai.
Aaj mausam kitna awesome hai na?
Bilkul, baarish aur thandi hawa ka perfect combo!
Boss ka mood aaj kaisa hai?
Aaj to boss ka mood surprisingly cool hai!
Tumhara birthday kab hai?
Mera birthday 5th August ko hai!
Mujhe ek acchi movie recommend karo.
Try watching 'Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara', bohot inspiring hai.
Itni mehnat ke baad bhi salary low hai.
True yaar, corporate life is tough sometimes.
Instagram pe naye reels daale kya?
Haan, kal ek funny reel post ki thi, dekh lena!
Train late hai kya?
Haan, kuch 30 minutes ka delay hai announcement ke hisaab se.
Kal trekking chalna hai kya?
Zaroor! Trekking ke liye always ready hoon main.
